metadata.title: CVE-2017-11541 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
tcpdump 4.9.0 has a heap-based buffer over-read in the lldp_print functionin print-lldp.c, related to util-print.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
